p: A dedicated mechanism involving pectin methylesterase inhibitors (PMEI) controls the cell-wall rigidity and decreases its visco-elasticity [ 37]. The lower expression of one PMEI ( gene-C4D60_Mb03t05630) in MT might be considered a strategy towards stem elongation [ 38]. We also observed reduced expression of cellulose synthase-like protein ( Ma08_g05160) and a member of glycosyltransferase like family 2 (cellulose synthase-like protein E2), while two probable mannan synthases (gene- C4D60_Mb07t06270 and Ma07_g22600) showed increased expression in MT (Additional TableÂ 3).
